title: Bat Bat
summaries: The Bat Bat is a pre-Hardmode melee weapon dropped by any type of bat with a 0.4*1/250 (0.4%) chance. On The Constant seed, the drop chance is increased to a 1*1/100 (1%) chance. Hitting an enemy with the Bat Bat always restores 1 health to the user.

statistics.Tooltip:
May heal user on hit
'Maybe I could bat some bats with this.'
statistics.Sell: 25
